About

Hi! I'm Claudia Boier, a Junior Web Automation Tester with a passion for ensuring software quality and reliability. I have experience with web automation testing using tools like Selenium, Playwright and Postman. I enjoy writing clear test cases, identifying bugs, and helping teams deliver high-quality products.

As a junior QA professional, I am eager to grow my skills in automated testing, learn new frameworks, and contribute to successful projects. I thrive in collaborative environments and am always excited to take on new challenges in web testing.

Short description
